
```{r, include=FALSE}
data <- read_xls("/Volumes/Peds Endo/Petter Bjornstad/Grants/Sharma Bjornstad adenine R01/CACTI data/QJDRF_DKD_Consortium_Data.xls")

# read in CVD data from separate file
load("/Volumes/BDC/Projects/Janet Snell-Bergeon/AHA collaborative grant/aha_master_data_no_snps.Rdata")
cvd <- df %>% select(StudyID,CVD,HardCVD)
data <- merge(data,cvd,by="StudyID",all.x = TRUE,all.y = FALSE)

data$Deceased <- ifelse(is.na(data$Deceased),0,data$Deceased)
data$DialysisEver <- ifelse(is.na(data$DialysisEver),0,data$DialysisEver)
#data$Transplant <- ifelse(is.na(data$Transplant),0,data$Transplant)


```

```{r echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
data$Deceased <- as.factor(data$Deceased)
data$DialysisEver <- as.factor(data$DialysisEver)
data$Transplant <- as.factor(data$Transplant)
data$CAD <- as.factor(data$CAD)
data$HardCAD <- as.factor(data$HardCAD)
t1 <- CreateTableOne(data=data, vars=c("Deceased","DialysisEver","Transplant","CAD","HardCAD","CVD","HardCVD"))
t1 <- print(t1)
```
